Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2015.2.2 (Build 805U)

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation: value = oconv(value, 'MCN') ; * strip out non-numerics return trim(fmt(value,'16R2')) ; * Format in a 16-character wide field with two decimal places. Trim the spaces off both ends.
